1 - Test Next*
stmt s, s1;
Select <s,s1> such that Next*(s,s1)
1 10,1 2,1 3,1 4,1 5,1 6,1 7,1 8,1 9,10 10,10 3,10 4,10 5,10 6,10 7,10 8,10 9,11 12,11 13,11 14,11 15,11 16,11 17,11 18,11 19,11 20,12 13,12 14,12 15,12 16,12 17,12 18,12 19,12 20,13 13,13 14,13 15,13 6 - Test Next* x 3 + Next* x 2(another group)

8 - Test Next* x 3 , Uses , with-clause (narrows result table)
stmt s, s1, s2, s3, s4; variable v;
Select s such that Next*(s, s1) and Next*(s1,s2) and Next*(s2,s3) and Modifies(s, _) with s.stmt# = 1
1
5000

10 - Test Next* x 2 , Uses + Calls* x 6
stmt s, s1, s2, s3, s4; variable v; procedure p, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6;

11 - Calls* x 7
procedure p, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7;
Select BOOLEAN such that Calls*(p,p1) and Calls*(p1,p2) and Calls*(p2,p3) and Calls*(p3,p4) and Calls*(p4,p5) and Calls*(p5,p6) and Calls*(p6,p7)
TRUE
5000
